channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump threatens to use the Insurrection Act to end protests in Minneapolis
item.description: President Donald Trump has threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act and deploy troops to quell persistent protests against Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers in Minneapolis.

item.title: Aggressive tactics used on Minneapolis protesters raise concerns about federal officer training
Proposals on immigration enforcement flood into state legislatures, heightened by Minnesota action
